title: Conjure Elemental
content:
Winter's Breath and Slam.

The myrmidon can cast Invisibility, Electrified Flail, and Raging Vortex.

The myrmidon can cast Muck to Metal, Sludgy Sling, and Burrow.

The myrmidon can cast Scorching Strike, Myrmidon's Immolation, and Cinderous Swipe.

The myrmidon can cast Hiemal Strike, Healing Vapours, and Explosive Icicle.

How to Acquire Conjure Elemental

Conjure Elemental can be acquired by the following classes: Druid, Circle of the Coast, Wizard, Warlock (Invocation), Bard (Magical Secret
